snippet: Nike announced on Friday that it had reached an agreement to sell its Cole Haan unit to the private equity firm Apax Partners for $570 million.
abstract: Nike announced on Friday that it had reached an agreement to sell its Cole Haan unit to the private equity firm Apax Partners for $570 million.

headline.main: Nike to Sell Cole Haan to Apax Partners for $570 Million
headline.print_headline: Nike to Sell Cole Haan for $570 Million
